Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
GenAI provided both positive and constructive feedback which helped me feel confident in areas I understood and helped me with actionable steps for areas Ineed to improve. 

Most of my teachers never provide positive feedback, even when the grade is high.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is able to provide much more comprehensive feedback and also you can give it drafts to refine your answers until you are happy with it. This is not possible with teachers.
